(촀\0I wanna to do a sit-up for every

(촀\0Someday I wanna run a marathon

I tried to run a lap around a rainbow

\0 (촀\0It didn't work out.

(촀\0Seeing a rainbow makes me wanna

( 촀\0A rainbow! 

\0
Like, "Today you will do triple sets."

(촀\0It happened! 
\0A double rainbow!

with this, n\0!
\0 Wow!

(촀\0Whoa! A double rainbow!
\0 That's
more than twice as many rainbows
as I was expecting today.

(촀\0Watching the aurora drift around is
super hypnoticn\0\0
\0(촀\0 Whoa!

zonked out there.

Auroras look like a giant shower
curtain in the sky. 
\0Which reminds
men\0\0
\0 (9촀\0I seriously need a shower.

(9촀\0Someone tried to explain auroras to

\0 (9촀\0Maybe somedayn
